description: A Network Sync trap signifies a change in clock defect status.

Summary.eval: ($v2 == 2) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS]' : ($v2 == 4) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [EFD]' : ($v2 == 6) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [EFD]' : ($v2 == 8) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LO_ESMC]' : ($v2 == 10) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [LO_ESMC]' : ($v2 == 12) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [EFD] [LO_ESMC]' : ($v2 == 14) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [EFD] [LO_ESMC]' : ($v2 == 16) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 18) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 20) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [EFD] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 22) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [EFD] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 24) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LO_ESMC] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 26) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [LO_ESMC] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 28) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [EFD] [LO_ESMC] [QL_FAILED]' : ($v2 == 30) ? 'Network sync $v1 clock has defects: [LOS] [EFD] [LO_ESMC] [QL_FAILED]' : 'Network sync $v1 clock has no defects'

description: A numerical representation of the chassis's Network Sync Clock source.
variables.name: ADTRAN-AOS-NETWORK-SYNC-MIB::adGenAOSNetSyncClockNumber

description: This variable indicates the Network Sync clock defect status.
The adGenAOSNetSyncClockDefectStatus is a bit map represented as a
sum, therefore, it can represent multiple defects simultaneously.
Bit 1 which represents no defects must be set if and only if no other
variables.name: ADTRAN-AOS-NETWORK-SYNC-MIB::adGenAOSNetSyncClockDefectStatus

description: A Network Sync trap signifies a change in Loss of timing state.
A numerical representation of the chassis's LTI(Loss of Timing Info) state.
variables.name: ADTRAN-AOS-NETWORK-SYNC-MIB::adGenAOSNetSyncLTIState

description: A Network Sync trap signifies a change in T4 interface squelch state.
A numerical representation of the T4 interface squelch state.
variables.name: ADTRAN-AOS-NETWORK-SYNC-MIB::adGenAOSNetSyncT4SquelchState
